scripts.clean: yarn workspace @dorgtech/dorg-token-contracts rm -rf artifacts && rm -rf cache && rm -rf types
scripts.build: yarn workspace @dorgtech/dorg-token-contracts clean && npx buidler compile && npx buidler typechain
scripts.coverage: yarn workspace @dorgtech/dorg-token-contracts build && npx buidler coverage --temp artifacts --network coverage
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn workspace @dorgtech/dorg-token-contracts && NETWORK=rinkeby npx buidler run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn workspace @dorgtech/dorg-token-contracts && NETWORK=mainnet npx buidler run --network mainnet scripts/deploy.ts
